meanings.definition: A picture or image that creates a three-dimensional effect when viewed correctly.
meanings.sent1: I stared at the stereograms until the hidden image popped out.
meanings.sent2: The stereograms on the wall seemed to come to life when I focused my eyes.
meanings.sent3: Trying to find the hidden image in the stereograms felt like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The stereograms were like magical windows into another world.
meanings.sent5: The stereograms made the room feel like it had more depth than it actually did.

meanings.definition: A type of optical illusion that requires the viewer to focus in a specific way to see hidden images.
meanings.sent1: The stereograms revealed hidden shapes when I adjusted my vision.
meanings.sent2: People often struggle to see the hidden images in stereograms at first glance.
meanings.sent3: Looking at stereograms sometimes feels like trying to find a secret message.
meanings.sent4: The stereograms played tricks on my eyes, making me question what I saw.
meanings.sent5: The stereograms challenged my perception in a fun and intriguing way.
